project_descr: Technical Assistance to the Ministry of Regional Development

outputs.output_descr: Strengthening of the institutional capacity of the Ministry of Regional Development to deliver efficient and targeted services to marginalized population across Suriname with particular emphasis on vulnerable and deprived communities in the hinterland. This will be achieved through support for the establishment of a strong national volunteerism programme, the Suricorps Foundation for Development; addressing specific needs for basic services of selected vulnerable and deprived hinterland communities; and local communities are empowered to have a voice in development processes through localizing

document_name: Technical Assistance to the Ministry of Regional Development
project_title: technical assistance to the ministry of regional develop
